title: League on a New Mac?
body:
Hey, guys, I have a MacBook air '13 with 2.2GHz dual-core Intel Core i7 processor. Can someone tell me how well League SHOULD run? Once I downloaded it and everything the client worked quite smoothly but once I got into a game the computer started to overheat (inside of the CPU reached 75 Celcius according to SMCfanControl) and crashed the game.

Any help anyone can offer regarding how well it should be running or giving tips to make it run better, or if anyone knows of programs I can use to make it run better perhaps?

All help appreciated

Thanks

replies.body: Make sure you're doing some [**general overheating troubleshooting**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#mq7) like cleaning out your fans and making sure there's sufficient airflow (nothing blocking fans and such). I'm told 75 C is a little hot, but might not be *too* hot, but it's still worth looking into if you suspect something is wrong!
Thanks for all the help! I'll be sure to try these things and see if they make a difference for me.
